title: A note about Championship Kha'Zix (warning)
body:
If you get the border for Championship Kha'Zix, and get a team chroma, BUT don't pay out the ass for the the team border that goes with the chroma, obviously you don't get the team border in the load screen, but it turns out you don't get your original championship border either while using that chroma.

Fun fact, 
Just for anyone who mistakenly thought they might be able to actually use what they paid for.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
